Added support for iOS and A12 devices. Whats new in 1.0.3:
======================
1. Fixed crash with Couria while launching quick reply window.
1. Fixed the protected conversation is being displayed when clicking on 'new conversation' icon and type the name of a contacts whose conversation is being protected in other groups.
2. Fixed the conversations are being hidden in 'System Groups' who are part of only in the first group.
3. When a detailed (all chats of a conversation) is being displayed for the first time directly, the text entry view is being disappeared. This issue is also fixed.
4. Added 'Remember Unlock Session' for TouchID supported devices. With this help it will remember you for few minutes (configurable from settings) or till your device is unlocked.
5. Few optimizations and other issues were addressed.
1. Fixed typing area hidden issue while Messages app is loading first time and directly opening a conversation.
2. Fixed non TouchID compatibility device issues such as unable to add Conversations to the newly created/existing groups.

Whats New?
===================
1. Added most awaiting feature, now Message Groups can hide conversations in the default groups that are part of your own groups. all you need to turn on the 'Hide Conversations in Default Groups' while creating or editing a group.
